attributes.action: Preserve the Subway at Molineux Stadium as a cultural icon
attributes.additional_details:
Wolves have been playing at Molineux stadium for 130 years. The subway is intrinsic to to building up atmosphere on a matchday. 
Fans congregate and away fans are intimidated by the atmosphere. It is a meeting point and landmark. 

https://www.expressandstar.com/news/local-hubs/wolverhampton/2019/10/01/molineux-subway-to-be-ditched-as-part-of-wolves-stadium-rebuild/
attributes.background:
Molineux is the home of Wolverhampton Wanderers.Currently ‘Wolves’ are playing in Europe. 
It has been mooted that Wolverhampton Council wish to demolish the subway to this iconic stadium.This subway is an integral part of the atmosphere and intimidation on a matchday. 
Please preserve this subway

rejection.details:
This is a matter for City of Wolverhampton Council. You could raise the issue with the council:

https://www.wolverhampton.gov.uk/contact-us

If you're a local resident, you could raise the issue with local councillors who represent you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

The Council has its own an e-petitions system. You can find out more here:

https://www.wolverhampton.gov.uk/your-council/decision-making/petitions
